article_title: Why Obamacare Shouldn't Force Poor Seniors Into Medicaid

article_metadata.description: The nearly 9 million Americans who are dually eligible for both Medicare and Medicaid have long been poorly served by the healthcare system. These elderly poor and disabled Americans suffer disproportionately from serious medical conditions. In the case of full duals, half initially qualified for Medicare because of disability rather than [...]
article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb
